channel.title: jekyll update on TooNormal
channel.description: Recent content in jekyll update on TooNormal

item.title: Now running Jekyll
item.description: Okay! I’ve migrated my blog to Jekyll (and GitHub). I followed this tutorial: https://girliemac.com/blog/2013/12/27/wordpress-to-jekyll/ Notably since I ran a very old WordPress blog, I had to manually copy over all the images and things NOT found in the /wp-content/ folder. This has made my tree a bit less organized (/content/, /wp-includes/) but at least it’s all there. Repo is here: https://github.com/mikekasprzak/blog (not that anyone other than me cares) Other Setup issues The default layout Jekyll doesn’t show any post content, just a list of posts.
